Class Student

java.lang.Object
  Student

public class Student
extends java.lang.Object

Student class forces the student to study and return true or false to show whether they have finished or not.

Version:
(10/12/2015)
Author:
(Sheel Shah)

Constructor Summary
Student(java.lang.String name, Library library)
          Instantiates a new student, name is passed into studentName along with library being passed into studentJoin and the amount of books is set to null.
 
Method Summary
 void describe()
          Prints out a condition statements.
 boolean finishedStudies()
          Finished studies, returns true if the student has finished otherwise false.
 void study()
          Invokes Study.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Student

public Student(java.lang.String name,
               Library library)
Instantiates a new student, name is passed into studentName along with library being passed into studentJoin and the amount of books is set to null.

Parameters:
name - the name
library - the library
Method Detail

describe

public void describe()
Prints out a condition statements. If the student does not have a book, a statement if student has a book along with a description of the textbook, ie: Title, Chapters left + read. Otherwise prints out Book has been finished if finished is true.

finishedStudies

public boolean finishedStudies()
Finished studies, returns true if the student has finished otherwise false.

Returns:
true, if successful

study

public void study()
Invokes Study. Forces the student to study if they do not have a book, read next chapter if they have a book and not finished itor close the book and return it if they have finished the book.
